body_html:
this PR should not be necessary. We link nvrtc and cuda against torch._nvrtc extension, and then load it before we load _C:
https://github.com/xdever/pytorch/blob/b35d45007a801d807b0901e063936fceb0452155/setup.py#L600-L608
